entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as the daughter-in-law of Mrs Weasley. She is described as feeding Bill bits of turkey off her own fork.

entities.name: remus lupin
entities.description: Remus Lupin is mentioned in conversation with Harry about Fleur.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as having her own family to go to for Christmas and also has a changed Patronus.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as getting Fleur for a daughter-in-law instead of Tonks.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as being fed by Fleur.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as saying that Tonks's Patronus has changed its form.

entities.name: patronuses
entities.description: Patronuses are mentioned in the context of their change and Remus Lupin's expertise.

relationships.description: Snape informed Harry that Tonks's Patronus has changed its form.
Remus Lupin is the man who knows all about Patronuses.
